KiyohimeMod:Stone.NAME: Saint Quartz
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #gBlessing-from-Chaldea .Gain #g3 Saint Quartz.Right-click it in combat to use Saint Quartz.
Use 1 Saint Quartz,heal 100% of your HP.

KiyohimeMod:TheBlackGrail.NAME: The Black Grail
KiyohimeMod:TheBlackGrail.FLAVOR: An illusion seen by a man haunted by justice.The corrupted Grail speaks.It says a price is required for what he seeks.Just like the maiden of fate, singing of love.
DESCRIPTIONS: NP Damage Up  #y80% .At the end of your turn,give 1 damage to you.

KiyohimeMod:Bond.NAME: Bond
KiyohimeMod:Bond.FLAVOR: Even if it's slightly different from the last time you met them, you still remember all the bonds with them.

KiyohimeMod:Necromancy.NAME: Necromancy
KiyohimeMod:Necromancy.FLAVOR: In the world of mages, there are many spells that should be avoided.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you receive #rFatal   #rDamage ,There is a certain probability that reduce damage to avoid death,and heal a little HP.

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would deal unblocked attack damage,increase it by  #r

KiyohimeMod:ElixirOfRejuvenation.NAME: Elixir of Rejuvenation
KiyohimeMod:ElixirOfRejuvenation.FLAVOR: One of the treasures inside the Treasury of the King of Heroes.It is said to be able to rejuvenate a person's physical appearance.It was originally a spiritual herb that was plucked from a ravine,It is a 'Medicine for Longevity' that was misrepresented as the Medicine for Immortality.
DESCRIPTIONS: If your HP is at or below #b50% at the start of combat, heal  #b

KiyohimeMod:HolyShroudOfMagdalene.FLAVOR: Noli me tangere.It is precisely in the mud of exorcism, where proof of a Saint is set.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would receive unblocked attack damage from an Elite,reduce it by  #b
